entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
